name: zoneminder
description: ZoneMinder is a self-hosted video surveillance system. It captures, monitors, and analyzes video from cameras, supports motion detection and alerting, and exposes a web UI for configuration and viewing.

features.title: Camera Support
features.description: Connect IP cameras, USB webcams, and analog cameras through capture cards with broad protocol support

features.title: Motion Detection
features.description: Automatically detect movement in camera feeds and trigger recording or alerts based on sensitivity settings

features.title: Continuous Recording
features.description: Record video continuously or only during motion events to balance storage usage and coverage

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Review, filter, and export recorded events with timestamps, thumbnails, and motion scores

features.title: Live Monitoring
features.description: View multiple camera feeds simultaneously in a grid layout with real-time streaming

features.title: Zone Configuration
features.description: Define specific areas within camera views to monitor while ignoring irrelevant motion

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send email or webhook alerts when motion is detected or cameras go offline

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Control pan, tilt, and zoom functions on supported cameras directly from the web interface
